form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: AFFIDAVIT IN PLACE OF MARRIAGE CERTIFICATE

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/14/2023 5RS WINDIANS and UIR GORD FIVE RUPEES HRA FIVE RUPEES 12214 15cop J Sold in Jeros Curches C. Sree Koma Murty, NO 37-67) leadaries STAMP Ret 1084 of Tapathi Road SECUNDERABAD AFFIDAVIT IN PLACE OF MARRIAGE CERTIFICATE I, Mrs. Kamala Ben Bhikalal Mody W/o Mr. Bhikalal Mody aged 80 years, Residing at H.No.27, Jeera Compound, Secunderabad (aso 3 A.P., India, do hereby solemnly and sincerely declare as follows: My Cousin namely Mr. Ramanlal Amritlal Kadakia go t married to , RAMTIBEN'. The details of the marriage are: 1. Name of the Bride : RAMTIBEN 2. Name of the Bride's mother: MAHALAKSHMI MODY, (late) 3. Name of the Bride's father: LALLUBHAI MODY. (late) 4. Name of the Bridegroom : RAMANLAL AMRITLAL KADAKI 5. Name of the Bridegroom's : DIWALI BEN (late) mother. 5.99, dr 2) & R,R.Day Autosticie NOTARY Arvind Godhole B S . . I D. L.L.M Hous No. 3-3 1005. Sultan Baz Hyderabad Appointed by the Govt. A.P.
